README¶

vocutil¶

Vocabulary utilities for educators and education platforms.

Description¶

This is a collection of utilities useful for generating and manipulating vocabulary lists (words and definitions) for educational use.

Installation¶

Install vocutil with:

pip install vocutil

or add as a poetry dependency.

If you desire a package locally built with poetry, download the source, change the appropriate lines in pyproject.toml, and rebuild.

Usage¶
